name: The Dodging Duck Brewhaus
description: Local brewery featuring German-inspired food and craft beers. A favorite gathering spot for locals and visitors alike.

name: Peggy's on the Green
description: Upscale dining experience located on the historic town square. Known for excellent service and creative seasonal menus.

name: Bear Moon Bakery
description: Local favorite for fresh-baked goods, breakfast, and excellent coffee. Perfect for a morning treat or casual lunch.
